name: Tricky Fidget Spinner - Just Spin It
name_original: Tricky Fidget Spinner - Just Spin It
description:
YOU THOUGHT SIMPLE SPINNING WAS RELAXING?...
TRY BREAKING STUFF WHILE IT'S SPINNING !
Prepare for the ultimate fast spinner mayhem.

Join spinner fans for FREE and start your free Fidget Spinner adventure now!
Blow off steam by playing this cool fidget spinner arcade game. Spin through crystal maze and spin it as fast as you can. It's free game to play and easy to play. Just fly around and pick mushrooms to spin the fidget spinner. Fidget games and spinner apps relax you. Fidget spinner is also known as hand spinner and fidget cube game. Help this addictive hand spinner game go viral by playing and sharing it with your friends.

You’ve seen them on the streets, on your commute and in your office: fidget spinners. Now these stress relieving toys are spinning in your hand on Android. With this simulator game, you no longer need a real fidget spinner!

A fidget spinner is a toy that sits like a propeller on a person’s finger, with blades that spin around a bearing. Basically a fidget spinner consists of two or three pronged design with a bearing in its center circular pad. Flick them for fun or for dumping your excess energy now! This fidget spinner simulation game is the best relaxing game. So forget other figet spinner games and give this fidget spinning game a try.

Fidget hand spinner features:

- Best mobile spinner game you will ever see
- Addictive spinner game with unique game mechanics
- Unique fidget spinner simulator game with authentic spinning physics
- Lots of spinning fidget spinners to choose from
- 60+ spinner graphics show even more details of the spinners
- Play with your friends and compete with them and compare your best scores.
- Swipe down, swipe up, swipe left, swipe right, slide or scroll to move fidget spinner.
- Crazy nuke simulator and deadly spikes included.
- Spin fidget spinner as far as you can to hit the best score.
- It's a free fidgets spinner game.

Spin the fidget spinner now to let off steam!
Fidget hand spinner removes your stress. Play this relaxing spinner game. Spin fidget spinner for free. Get this free spinner app NOW!
